message: We have 3 camping sites. Each site can have up to 4 tents. Discuss.
I would like to use my 1-2-person tent; I also have an extra 1 person tent but I've never used it (bought for $5 at a stoop-sale).  I'll check it out this weekend to see how good it is.
I could use a tent if you would be willing to loan it out vicmorris, or anyone else for that matter.
I will bring a 4 man tent. With a 4 tent per site limit, some sharing will be necessary.
I have a 4 man tent (sleeps 3 comfortably)- Amy, Audray, and I are planning on sharing this tent.
If there are any girls that have extra space in a tent or if I could borrow an extra tent I would appreiate it! :)
I have a 3-man that is really good for 2. Also, a 2-man tent good for 1 or 2 smaller people.
I have an extra 3-man (2 comfortably), if anyone needs to borrow it.  I will not be coming up until Saturday morning but I can send it in a Friday car.
Melissa, could I borrow your extra tent? I am going to head up Friday though.
I have a 3 man tent as well.
I actually just picked up a tent yesterday from Katy that I can borrow.  Thanks!
excellent. I think everybody with a large tent should bring it.
I have a 3 man tent and a 1.5 man tent.  Let me know if I should bring it.
please bring your 3 man tent. If we need it, it would be nice to have the option.
